Package com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CurationsImageLoader  
    CurationsInfiniteRecyclerView.OnFeedItemClickListener
    Listener to be notified when a CurationsFeedItem cell is tapped
    CurationsInfiniteRecyclerView.OnPageLoadListener
    Listener to be notified when paging requests succeeds or fails
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurationsAspectRatioImageView  
    CurationsInfiniteRecyclerView
    Helper View class to manage fetching and displaying a Grid of CurationsFeedItems

    Make sure to implement your own CurationsImageLoader to manage the fetching and displaying of images.
    CurationsView
    Bazaarvoice provided FrameLayout to contain a single CurationsFeedItem This view will allow Bazaarvoice to receive feedback about the users interaction with the item in order to help build ROI reports
